mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, email, phone_number, created_at) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, now())
mapper.update: update user set name=#{user.name}, password=#{user.password}, email= #{user.email}, phone_number=#{user.phoneNumber} where user_id=#{user.userId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select company_username username from company union ALL select username username from user) t where username=#{username}

SELECT RANK() over (ORDER BY COUNT(subscribe_company_id) desc) as ranking, COUNT(subscribe_company_id) likes, c.company_name name, c.company_logo logo FROM subscribe s RIGHT OUTER JOIN company c ON s.subscribe_company_id = c.company_id GROUP BY subscribe_company_id HAVING COUNT(subscribe_company_id) > 0 ORDER BY ranking
